front.title: MIME Sub-type Registrations for unified messaging

abstract.t: This document describes the registration of the MIME sub-types multipart/voice-message and multipart/fax for use with the Voice Profile for Internet Mail (VPIM) for Unified Messaging. It also introduces the primary content type concept. A further description of usage can be found in the VPIM v3 specification. The VPIM WG home page is: http://www.ema.org/vpim
